en: But they never lose their way.
zh: 但是他们从来不会迷路。

en: But how can they do this?
zh: 但是他们是怎么做到的呢？

en: But, he didn't keep his promise.
zh: 但是，他没有遵守他的承诺。

en: But he can't enjoy hot summers.
zh: 但是他无法享受炎热的夏天。

en: But he was lucky.
zh: 但是他是幸运的。

en: But he is bad at reading English.
zh: 但是他不擅长阅读英语。

en: But he was excited too.
zh: 但是他也很兴奋。

en: But he doesn't know it yet.
zh: 但是他现在还不知道。

en: But his friends call him Ken.
zh: 但是他的朋友们叫他肯。

en: But few of them are worth reading.
zh: 但是他们中很少有值得阅读的。

en: But in spite of the merits of being single, they do want to get married some day.
zh: 但是尽管单身有好处，他们还是希望有一天能结婚。

en: However, the guarantee is not effective at all outside the fixed form.
zh: 然而，该保证在固定形式之外根本无效。

en: But earthquakes are still as frightening as ever.
zh: 但是地震仍然像以往一样可怕。

en: But the boy stayed away for a long time.
zh: 但是那个男孩离开了很长时间。

en: But no man could help me.
zh: 但是没有人能帮助我。

en: But she had not expected to cross an ocean, enter a new and romantic-sounding country, and find herself in exactly the same position.
zh: 但是她没有想到会跨越海洋，进入一个听起来既新鲜又浪漫的国家，却发现自己处境完全一样。

en: But they look very green, don't they?
zh: 但是它们看起来很绿，不是吗？

en: But being bored is also fun in a way.
zh: 但是无聊在某种程度上也很有趣。

en: But showing off the presents could embarrass the guests who did not bring one.
zh: 但是炫耀礼物可能会让没有带礼物的客人感到尴尬。

en: If the other party does not offer personal information, however, it is better to leave it alone.
zh: 但是，如果对方不提供个人信息，最好还是不要追问。

en: But light does not travel at the same speed through all materials; it goes slower through some than through others.
zh: 但是光在所有材料中的传播速度并不相同；它在某些材料中传播得更慢。

en: That, however, tells you just about as much as you would know about water if you were told that it was wet.
zh: 然而，这告诉你的信息，就像你被告知水是湿的一样，对水的了解并没有增加多少。

en: But every man had to give five years of service to the government.
zh: 但是每个人都必须为政府服务五年。

en: But people have little hope.
zh: 但是人们几乎没有希望。

en: But whoever lives by the truth come into the right.
zh: 但是凡是按真理而行的，就来就光。

en: But more often than not, we came back empty-handed.
zh: 但更多的时候，我们空手而归。

en: But I slept right through the class. Don't you ever sleep through an eight-thirty class?
zh: 但我上课的时候睡着了。你有没有上八点半的课睡着过？

en: But I wasn't afraid.
zh: 但我并不害怕。

en: Even today, however, women struggle against discrimination.
zh: 然而，即使在今天，女性仍在与歧视作斗争。

en: But today smoking in public places is forbidden or strictly restricted.
zh: 但现在在公共场所吸烟是被禁止或严格限制的。

en: Nowadays, however, calculators can be used freely in school examinations, and already in many schools the only sound to be heard during a math exam is the sound of children tapping on their calculators.
zh: 然而，现在学校考试可以自由使用计算器，而且在许多学校，数学考试期间唯一能听到的声音就是孩子们敲击计算器的声音。

en: But today, a lot of young people are following her example.
zh: 但今天，很多年轻人都在效仿她的榜样。

en: However, I can't help noticing, at this moment, that at first glance it seems inevitable that the shark will devour the man.
zh: 然而，在这一刻，我忍不住注意到，乍一看，鲨鱼似乎不可避免地会吞噬这个人。

en: But now things have changed tremendously.
zh: 但现在情况已经发生了巨大的变化。

en: But you're not there.
zh: 但是你不在那里。

en: But you don't want to bend the knees too much.
zh: 但是你不想把膝盖弯曲太多。

en: But, to his credit, he didn't say anything against her.
zh: 但是，值得称赞的是，他没有说任何对她不利的话。

en: But we carried on without him.
zh: 但我们没有他就继续前进了。

en: We believe, however, that over a period of time, we will be able to make remittance in full settlement.
zh: 然而，我们相信，经过一段时间，我们将能够全额汇款结算。

zh: 然而，露西即将离开她的家。

en: But Pepperberg says working with the parrot has already changed the way of looking at animals.
zh: 但佩珀伯格说，与鹦鹉一起工作已经改变了看待动物的方式。

en: However, his girlfriend is selfish and hardly worries about Brian.
zh: 然而，他的女朋友很自私，几乎不关心布莱恩。

en: One evening, however, when Miss Baker got back to the college a few minutes before the time by which all students had to be in, she found another car in her parking space.
zh: 然而，一天晚上，贝克小姐在所有学生必须返回的时间前几分钟回到学院时，她发现她的停车位上停着另一辆车。

en: However, the amount of wind available varies with the location and the season of the year.
zh: 然而，可用的风量随地点和一年中的季节而变化。

en: However, the quantity was not correct.
zh: 然而，数量不正确。

en: His words, however, were not believed at all.
zh: 然而，他的话根本不被相信。

en: Yet Japan is still not sufficiently understood by other countries, and the Japanese, likewise, find foreigners difficult to understand.
zh: 然而，日本仍然没有被其他国家充分理解，同样，日本人也觉得外国人难以理解。

en: What I most noticed about my Japanese high school, however, was the great respect shown by students toward their teachers.
zh: 然而，我对我的日本高中印象最深的是学生们对老师表现出的极大的尊重。

en: However, only the human community has verbal languages as a means of communication.
zh: 然而，只有人类社会才拥有口头语言作为交流的手段。

en: Real change for most black people, however, was very slow in coming.
zh: 然而，对于大多数黑人来说，真正的改变来得很慢。

en: Why people fall into these categories, however, is a mystery.
zh: 然而，人们为何会落入这些类别仍然是个谜。

en: There was, however, a need for food to be carried from the bowl to the mouth, and chopsticks came along to meet that need.
zh: 然而，当时确实需要将食物从碗里送到嘴里，筷子应运而生，满足了这一需求。

en: However, the color was different from the sample color in your catalog.
zh: 然而，颜色与您目录中的样品颜色不同。

en: I cannot, however, agree to your opinion.
zh: 然而，我不能同意你的意见。

en: However, it is too expensive.
zh: 然而，这太贵了。

en: However, some people in the audience were not pleased with the results.
zh: 然而，观众中的一些人对结果并不满意。

en: However, Beth seems to be indifferent to Chris's grief.
zh: 然而，贝丝似乎对克里斯的悲伤漠不关心。

en: The interpretation of this data, however, is very much in dispute.
zh: 然而，对这些数据的解读存在很大争议。

en: This problem, however, should be considered more carefully.
zh: 然而，这个问题应该更仔细地考虑。

en: The strike had not been peaceful, however, and Rev. Martin Luther King, Jr. begged both sides to be patient and calm.
zh: 然而，罢工并非和平进行，小马丁·路德·金牧师恳求双方保持耐心和冷静。

en: We concluded, however that the price of 5,000,000 yen was too high.
zh: 然而，我们认为500万日元的价格太高了。

en: But you know, there's no telling about that other world.
zh: 但是你知道，那个世界的事情说不准。

en: But in the end he put the book on the fire.
zh: 但最终他还是把书扔进了火里。

en: But it looked comfortable.
zh: 但它看起来很舒服。

en: But the answers were all wrong.
zh: 但是答案都是错的。

en: But in return they get a clear look at important games, and if they miss something, they can always rely on the commentator's description or the instant replay.
zh: 但作为回报，他们可以清楚地看到重要的比赛，如果他们错过了什么，他们总是可以依靠评论员的描述或即时重放。

en: But then, full of guilt, I sat down at my desk one evening.
zh: 但是后来，我充满了内疚，一天晚上我坐在了我的办公桌前。

en: But Susan promised that she would call.
zh: 但是苏珊答应她会打电话。

en: However, this has not always been true.
zh: 然而，情况并非总是如此。

en: But this is an issue to which we return later.
zh: 但这是一个我们稍后会再讨论的问题。

en: However, please put this book away first.
zh: 然而，请先收起这本书。

en: But where is this compass?
zh: 但是这个指南针在哪里？

en: That proved to be no more than an expression of optimism when World War II began.
zh: 当第二次世界大战开始时，这被证明只不过是一种乐观的表达。

en: But you do. Please help me.
zh: 但是你记得。请帮帮我。

en: However, I recommend that you take the JR Narita Express (a train leaves every 30-60 minutes from the airport), to avoid the complexity of changing trains.
zh: 然而，我建议您乘坐JR成田特快（一列火车每30-60分钟从机场出发），以避免换乘火车的复杂性。

en: But poor people did not go to concerts.
zh: 但是穷人不去听音乐会。

en: But after she does that with the first glass, what is she going to do with the second one?
zh: 但是她用第一个杯子做完之后，第二个杯子她打算怎么办呢？

en: However, he was hurt when she quickly disposed of the present.
zh: 然而，当她很快处理掉礼物时，他感到很受伤。

en: But they will come here tomorrow.
zh: 但是他们明天会来这里。

en: But he plays soccer with his friend.
zh: 但是他和他的朋友一起踢足球。

en: But he knew he had no choice.
zh: 但是他知道他别无选择。

en: He might, however, have seen a wooden peg of a different size or color.
zh: 然而，他可能见过不同尺寸或颜色的木钉。

en: But he did not often smile.
zh: 但他不常微笑。

en: But his friends got together to help him.
zh: 但是他的朋友们聚在一起帮助他。

en: I cannot, however, neglect his warning.
zh: 然而，我不能忽视他的警告。

en: But we do know many things about his character, thanks to letters and notebooks he left behind and other people's stories about him.
zh: 但是，多亏了他留下的信件和笔记本，以及其他人关于他的故事，我们确实了解很多关于他性格的事情。

en: But the farmer was kind to him and taught him a lot.
zh: 但是农夫对他很好，教了他很多东西。

en: But the farmer smiled at him.
zh: 但是农夫对他笑了笑。

en: But there are always some cheap standing tickets for the finals that you can buy on the day.
zh: 但是总有一些便宜的站票可以在决赛当天购买。

en: However, we can be people of the earth.
zh: 然而，我们可以成为地球人。

en: But no one's lifted a finger.
zh: 但是没有人伸出援手。

en: But it was not successful for long because everyone, even religious people, had a strong attraction to the game.
zh: 但是它并没有成功很久，因为每个人，即使是宗教人士，都对这个游戏有着强烈的吸引力。

en: But, most smokers try to avoid thinking about these things.
zh: 但是，大多数吸烟者都尽量避免考虑这些事情。

en: But in many ways, the bird called Alex is unusual, for it has shown the kind of mental abilities that scientists once thought only humans had.
zh: 但是从很多方面来说，这只名叫Alex的鸟是不寻常的，因为它表现出了科学家们曾经认为只有人类才拥有的精神能力。

en: But all in all, things have gone well.
zh: 但总的来说，一切都进展顺利。

en: But everyone else is still.
zh: 但是其他人都静止不动。

en: But human beings are different.

en: But not really.

en: But I want a car.
zh: 但是我想买一辆车。

en: But this is not true.

en: But a collection of facts is not science any more than a dictionary is poetry.
zh: 但是，事实的堆砌并不等同于科学，正如字典不是诗歌一样。

en: However, I'm not good at speaking English.
zh: 但是，我不擅长说英语。

en: But I'm not sure whether it brings happiness to everybody.

en: But my mother always answered.

en: But we can't understand him.
zh: 但是，我们听不懂他说什么。

en: But the first thing we say is "hello."
zh: 但是，我们说的第一句话是“你好”。

en: But she liked children and she enjoyed her work.
zh: 但是，她喜欢孩子，也喜欢她的工作。

en: But he needed a job.
zh: 但是，他需要一份工作。

en: But my older sister is good at swimming.
zh: 但是，我姐姐擅长游泳。

en: However, a new type of humor, which stems largely from America, has recently come into fashion.
zh: 然而，一种主要源于美国的新型幽默最近开始流行。

en: But now I live in Tokyo.
zh: 但是，我现在住在东京。

en: Only through protest can a free and open society be maintained.
zh: 只有通过抗议才能维持自由和开放的社会。

en: In the case of language, however, it is only the ability to talk and understand that we inherit genetically; the particular language or languages that we speak are passed on to us not by genetic transmission but by cultural transmission.
zh: 然而，就语言而言，我们通过基因遗传的只是说话和理解的能力；我们所说的特定语言并非通过基因遗传，而是通过文化传承传递给我们的。

en: Yet giving up is not impossible.
zh: 然而，放弃并非不可能。

en: But if we were wholly rational, would we want children at all?
zh: 但是，如果我们完全理性，我们还会想要孩子吗？

en: But Tuesday mornings were different, because Tuesday was music day.
zh: 但是，星期二的早上与众不同，因为星期二是音乐日。

en: However, they can help him breathe with a machine.
zh: 然而，他们可以用机器帮助他呼吸。

en: However, I have no money.
zh: 但是，我没有钱。

en: But the robot made trouble.
zh: 但是，机器人惹了麻烦。

en: However, if he is brain-dead, he will never think, speak, or hear again.
zh: 然而，如果他脑死亡，他将永远无法思考、说话或听见。

en: But you know it's all in Japanese.
zh: 但是，你知道那全是日语。

en: But soon he would not be able to walk, write, or even eat by himself.
zh: 但是，很快他就无法行走、写作，甚至自己吃饭了。

en: But he was always happy to leave again.
zh: 但是，他总是很高兴再次离开。

en: Most studies, however, have not focused on the influence Emmet's theory had on computer graphics.
zh: 然而，大多数研究并没有关注埃米特理论对计算机图形学的影响。

en: But the Nobel Committee said that poverty was a threat to world peace, and Mother Teresa worked against poverty.
zh: 但是，诺贝尔委员会说贫困是对世界和平的威胁，而特蕾莎修女致力于消除贫困。

en: But Tony was not a clever boy.
zh: 但是托尼不是个聪明的孩子。

en: But how that comes about I am at a loss to explain.
zh: 但我实在无法解释那是怎么发生的。

en: But he wanted a son very much.
zh: 但是他非常想要一个儿子。

en: But the benefits are significant at all ages.
zh: 但是这些好处在所有年龄段都很显著。

en: But very very difficult.
zh: 但是非常非常困难。

en: But the rise in prices is a consequence of that policy.
zh: 但是物价上涨是那项政策的后果。

en: But then he fell in love with Jane Wilde, a student studying languages in London.
zh: 但是后来他爱上了简·王尔德，一位在伦敦学习语言的学生。

en: But, then again, Latin was already a "dead language" by that time.
zh: 但是，话又说回来，拉丁语在那个时候已经是一种“死语言”了。

en: But, that thing is said to no one.
zh: 但是，那件事是不会对任何人说的。

en: Not only career-minded women have desire to work.
zh: 不仅仅是事业心强的女性才有工作的愿望。

en: But when the monkey came back, the tin cup was always empty.
zh: 但是当猴子回来时，锡杯总是空的。

en: But this is the story of an old man who wants to die.
zh: 但这是一个关于一位想要死去的老人的故事。

en: But there had been no indications Gorbachev was having any sort of health problems, and it is not exactly clear what's happened to him now.
zh: 但是没有任何迹象表明戈尔巴乔夫有任何健康问题，而且现在还不清楚他发生了什么事。

en: But the boys spent all their holidays on Mr Wood's farm.
zh: 但是这些男孩们把所有的假期都花在了伍德先生的农场里。

en: But this claim is emphatically not the one that Dennett is making.
zh: 但是丹尼特明确表示他并没有提出这个主张。

en: But this did not stop him from using his mind and presenting his ideas at physics meetings around the world.
zh: 但这并没有阻止他运用他的思想，并在世界各地的物理学会议上展示他的想法。

en: But the reason I came baptizing with water was that he might be revealed to Israel.
zh: 但我用水施洗的目的，是要他显明给以色列人。

en: But the Evans were clean and they had enough to eat.
zh: 但是埃文斯一家很干净，而且他们有足够的食物。

en: But the temple he had spoken of was his body.
zh: 但是他所说的圣殿是指他的身体。

en: But Jesus would not entrust himself to them.
zh: 但是耶稣不信任他们。

en: However, like America, Japan is predominantly a middle-class, middle-income country, and so wives do not employ maids, but attend to everything themselves.
zh: 然而，像美国一样，日本主要是一个中产阶级、中等收入的国家，所以妻子们不雇佣女佣，而是自己处理一切。

en: However, in America, sports teams are generally chosen by skill, and academic courses by ability.
zh: 然而，在美国，运动队通常是按技能选择的，而学术课程是按能力选择的。

en: But still you people do not accept our testimony.
zh: 但是你们这些人仍然不接受我们的证词。

en: But among you stands one you do not know.
zh: 但在你们中间站着一位你们不认识的人。

en: Can I reserve a flight to Chicago?
zh: 我可以预订一张去芝加哥的机票吗？

en: We flew from New York to St. Louis by way of Chicago.
zh: 我们经由芝加哥从纽约飞往圣路易斯。

en: I want a round-trip ticket to Chicago.
zh: 我想要一张到芝加哥的往返票。

en: Chicago is the principal city of the Middle West.
zh: 芝加哥是美国中西部的主要城市。

en: It was raining around Chicago.
zh: 芝加哥附近在下雨。

en: I'll call you as soon as I get to Chicago.
zh: 我一到芝加哥就给你打电话。

en: Her decision to move to Chicago surprised us.
zh: 她决定搬到芝加哥让我们感到惊讶。

en: I'd like to place a person-to-person call to Chicago.
zh: 我想打一个芝加哥的指定人电话。

en: Can I stop over in Chicago?
zh: 我可以在芝加哥停留吗？

en: I stayed in Chicago over two months.
zh: 我在芝加哥待了两个多月。

en: Snow is apt to fall in Chicago in late November.
zh: 在芝加哥，十一月末容易下雪。

en: The plane from Chicago arrived at the airport late at night.
zh: 从芝加哥来的飞机深夜才到达机场。

en: John cannot keep his family.
zh: 约翰无法养活他的家人。

en: A gentleman is a man of independent means.
zh: 绅士是有独立经济能力的人。

en: I left Jeremy poring over his notes for his first accountancy exam tomorrow.
zh: 我离开杰里米的时候，他正在埋头苦读笔记，准备明天的第一次会计考试。

en: Yes, I'll have sherry.
zh: 好的，我来一杯雪利酒。

en: Jerry is the bean counter for our company.
zh: 杰瑞是我们公司的会计。

en: Did Jerry really win a lottery?
zh: 杰瑞真的中彩票了吗？

en: Shelly's really filled out since the last time I saw her.
zh: 自从上次我见到雪莉之后，她真的丰满了许多。

en: Jeff thinks he will never fall in love.
zh: 杰夫认为他永远不会坠入爱河。

en: Jeffrey is called Jeff by his friends.
zh: 杰弗里的朋友们叫他杰夫。

en: Jeff seems to know where she is.
zh: 杰夫似乎知道她在哪里。

en: Jeff had to pound the pavement for three months before he found a job.
zh: 杰夫不得不奔波了三个月才找到工作。

en: Jeff lost yesterday's match, but I'm sure he is a promising tennis player.
zh: 杰夫输了昨天的比赛，但我相信他是一位很有前途的网球运动员。

en: Jeff wore the tie which Kim had given him for a birthday present.
zh: 杰夫戴着金送给他的生日礼物领带。

en: Jeff and Mia are making a last ditch effort to avoid a divorce.
zh: 杰夫和米娅正在做最后的努力以避免离婚。

en: Jennifer has a good eye for beauty.
zh: 詹妮弗很有眼光，能发现美。

en: It doesn't taste all that great for all the effort and technique the chef put into it.

zh: 谢谢你的关心。

en: It was very kind of you to invite me.
zh: 你真好，邀请我。

en: Thank you for inviting me.
zh: 谢谢你邀请我。

en: You see, he is a good baseball player.
zh: 你看，他是个优秀的棒球运动员。

en: What line of work are you in?
zh: 你从事什么工作？

en: I am much obliged to you for your help.
zh: 我非常感谢你的帮助。

en: I cannot thank you enough for your assistance.
zh: 我对你的帮助感激不尽。

en: I am more than grateful to you for your help.
zh: 我非常感谢你的帮助。

en: I greatly appreciate your advice.
zh: 我非常感谢你的建议。

en: Please sign your name here.
zh: 请在这里签名。

en: Let me know your departure in advance.
zh: 请提前告诉我你的出发时间。

en: Let me know the time you are leaving.
zh: 请告诉我你离开的时间。

en: Write your address, please.
zh: 请写下你的地址。

en: Thank you for making the arrangements.
zh: 谢谢你安排一切。

en: Is the master of the house at home?
zh: 请问主人在家吗？

en: I believe he'll be with us today.
zh: 我相信他今天会和我们在一起。

en: I recommend a thorough checkup for your husband.
zh: 我建议给您丈夫做个彻底的检查。

en: Please give my best regards to your husband.
zh: 请代我向您丈夫问好。

en: I understand you wish to contact your husband.
zh: 我知道您想联系您的丈夫。

en: In respect to your question, I have nothing to say.
zh: 关于您的问题，我无可奉告。

en: Help yourself to the fruit.
zh: 请随便吃水果。

en: Please feel free to link to my page.
zh: 请随意链接到我的页面。

en: Please help yourself to the desserts.
zh: 请随便吃甜点。

en: Help yourself.
zh: 请自便。

en: Please help yourself to the apple pie.
zh: 请随便吃苹果派。

en: He thus revealed his glory.
zh: 他由此彰显了他的荣耀。

en: Please make sure that your seat belt is securely fastened.
zh: 请确保您的安全带已系好。

en: Did you plan it yourself?
zh: 这是你自己计划的吗？

en: Why don't you make it yourself?
zh: 你为什么不自己做呢？

en: Would it inconvenience you to go yourself?
zh: 您亲自去会不方便吗？

en: What's your home phone number?
zh: 你家的电话号码是多少？

en: Please accept our heartiest congratulations on the marriage of your son.
zh: 请接受我们对您儿子结婚的最衷心的祝贺。

en: For your information.
zh: 供您参考。

en: We look forward to your entries.
zh: 我们期待您的参与。

en: Thank you very much for attending.
zh: 非常感谢您的出席。

en: I congratulate you on your engagement.
zh: 恭喜您订婚。

en: I'm familiar with your name.
zh: 我对您的名字很熟悉。

en: I wish you good luck.
zh: 祝你好运。

en: I appreciate what you've done for me.
zh: 感谢您为我所做的一切。

en: I am deeply grateful to you for your kindness.
zh: 我非常感谢您的好意。

en: I'm deeply grateful for your kindness.
zh: 我非常感谢您的好意。

en: I appreciate your thoughtfulness.
zh: 感谢您的体贴。

en: For your consideration.
zh: 感谢您的考虑。

en: Here's to your health!
zh: 祝您身体健康！

en: May you be blessed with good health.
zh: 祝您身体健康。

en: Are you married or are you single?
zh: 您结婚了吗？还是单身？

en: I wish you great happiness in your marriage.
zh: 祝您婚姻幸福美满。

en: I would like to extend our best wishes on your marriage.
zh: 谨向你们的新婚致以最美好的祝愿。

en: We have just received an inquiry from Kansas concerning your brother.
zh: 我们刚刚收到一封来自堪萨斯的关于您兄弟的询问。

en: You must keep in with your neighbors.
zh: 你一定要和邻居搞好关系。

en: Thank you for your trouble.
zh: 给您添麻烦了。

en: Thank you in advance for your help.
zh: 提前感谢您的帮助。

en: Thank you in advance for your cooperation.
zh: 提前感谢您的合作。

en: Thank you for your cooperation in advance.
zh: 提前感谢您的合作。

en: I really appreciate your cooperation.
zh: 我非常感谢您的合作。

en: Thank you for your kind assistance.
zh: 感谢您的热情帮助。

en: I appreciate your cooperation.
zh: 感谢您的合作。

en: Thank you for your cooperation.
zh: 感谢您的合作。

en: How do you feel today?
zh: 你今天感觉怎么样？

en: I am not quite sure if we can meet your requirements.
zh: 我不太确定我们是否能满足您的要求。

en: When you decide which plan you want, please notify us in writing.
zh: 当您决定选择哪个方案时，请以书面形式通知我们。

en: I'll see if there's anything I can do.
zh: 我看看有没有什么能帮上忙的。

en: I'll try to meet your wishes.
zh: 我会尽量满足您的愿望。

en: Please confirm.
zh: 请确认。

en: Did you bring your family with you?
zh: 你把你的家人带来了吗？

en: Do you have a family?
zh: 你有家庭吗？

en: How about your family?
zh: 你的家人怎么样？

en: Please remember me to your family.
zh: 请代我向你的家人问好。

en: How's your family?
zh: 你的家人好吗？

en: Give my love to your family.
zh: 请代我向你的家人表达我的爱意。

en: Give my best regards to all your family.
zh: 请代我向你的家人致以最诚挚的问候。

en: How's it going with your family?
zh: 你的家人最近怎么样？

en: Please remember me to all your family.
zh: 请代我向你的所有家人问好。

en: I'd rather not.
zh: 我还是不要了吧。

en: I appreciate your help.
zh: 感谢你的帮助。

en: I regret that I can't help you.
zh: 很遗憾我不能帮助你。

en: I am grateful to you for your help.
zh: 我感谢你对我的帮助。

en: We appreciate your help.
zh: 我们感谢你的帮助。

en: Congratulations on your promotion.
zh: 恭喜你升职。

en: How about having dinner together?
zh: 一起吃个饭怎么样？

en: Won't you have tea with us?
zh: 要不要和我们一起喝茶？

en: Won't you have some tea with me?
zh: 要不要和我一起喝点茶？

en: Would you care to join me?
zh: 你愿意加入我吗？

en: It is regrettable that I can't go with you.
zh: 很遗憾我不能和你一起去。

en: I am only too glad to be with you.
zh: 我非常高兴能和你在一起。

en: "May I go with you?" "Of course."
zh: “我可以和你一起去吗？” “当然可以。”

en: How many are there in your party, sir?
zh: 先生，请问你们一共几位？

en: If you change your address, please let me know.
zh: 如果你更改地址，请告诉我。

en: I am willing to agree to your request.
zh: 我愿意同意你的请求。

en: The sunshine penetrated the thick leaves of the trees.
zh: 阳光穿透了树木浓密的树叶。

en: Don't run on your sentences with commas.
zh: 不要用逗号连接过长的句子。

en: The computer terminals were lined up in one long row.
zh: 电脑终端排成了一长排。

en: IBM has the lion's share of the large computer market; nobody else even comes close.
zh: IBM占据了大型计算机市场的大部分份额； 没有人能与之匹敌。

en: The development of the computer industry has been very rapid.
zh: 计算机产业的发展非常迅速。

en: There are many jobs available in the computer industry.
zh: 计算机行业有很多就业机会。

en: The computer industry is enjoying a boom.
zh: 计算机行业正在蓬勃发展。

en: I shopped around for my computer and ended up paying $200 less than David.
zh: 我货比三家买了电脑，结果比戴维少花了 200 美元。

en: We are looking for somebody who can use a computer.
zh: 我们正在寻找会使用电脑的人。

en: If you use a computer, you can retain information.
zh: 如果你使用电脑，你可以保留信息。

en: Computers will save you much time and energy when you deal with figures and graphs.
zh: 当您处理数字和图表时，计算机将为您节省大量时间和精力。

en: Computers will save you a lot of time.
zh: 电脑会为你节省很多时间。

en: They might pay me more if I could use a computer.
zh: 如果我会用电脑，他们可能会付我更多钱。

en: Computer users have so many buzzwords, it's a wonder if anyone else can understand them.
zh: 电脑用户有很多专业术语，真不知道其他人是否能理解。

en: In order to use a computer, you must learn to type.
zh: 为了使用电脑，你必须学会打字。

en: He located the computer, poured in the sample and deposited the $10.00.
zh: 他找到了电脑，倒入样品并存入了 10.00 美元。

en: A computer is a complex machine.
zh: 电脑是一台复杂的机器。

en: Computers are capable of doing very complicated work in a split second.
zh: 电脑能够在瞬间完成非常复杂的工作。

en: A computer can calculate very rapidly.
zh: 电脑可以非常快速地计算。

en: The computer is a relatively recent invention.
zh: 电脑是一项相对较新的发明。

en: The computer is placed to the left of the women.
zh: 电脑放在女性的左边。

en: Computers are difficult, so I get confused.
zh: 电脑很难，所以我感到困惑。

en: Computers are used to send messages by e-mail.
zh: 电脑用于通过电子邮件发送消息。

en: Computers can be thought of as mere calculating machines.
zh: 电脑可以被认为是单纯的计算机器。

en: Computers can save us a lot of time and trouble.
zh: 电脑可以为我们节省大量时间和麻烦。

en: Computers can give us facts, but they can't give us experience.
zh: 电脑能给我们事实，但不能给我们经验。

en: The computer is a recent invention.
zh: 电脑是最近的发明。

en: The machine again made the usual noise and printed out the following analysis.
zh: 机器再次发出通常的噪音，并打印出以下分析结果。

en: The computer has made a great impact on modern life.
zh: 电脑对现代生活产生了巨大的影响。

en: A computer is an absolute necessity now.
zh: 现在电脑是绝对必需品。

en: Computers are capable of doing extremely complicated work.
zh: 电脑能够完成极其复杂的工作。

en: Computers have made rapid progress.
zh: 电脑取得了迅速的进展。

en: Computers are of great use.
zh: 电脑非常有用。

en: Computers are constantly being improved.
zh: 电脑在不断改进。

en: Computers have invaded every field.
zh: 电脑已经渗透到各个领域。

en: Computers caused a great, if gradual, change.
zh: 电脑引起了巨大的，即使是渐进的，变化。

en: The more I studied computers, the more interesting I came to find it.
zh: 我越研究电脑，就越觉得它有趣。

en: Knowledge of computers is basic to all sciences.
zh: 电脑知识是所有科学的基础。

en: Do you know how to operate a computer?
zh: 你知道如何操作电脑吗？

en: The use of electronic computers is growing rapidly.
zh: 电子计算机的使用正在迅速增长。

en: What a waste to buy such an expensive machine even though he doesn't even know how to use computers.
zh: 他甚至不知道如何使用电脑，买这么贵的机器真是浪费。

en: It's possible to branch out from computing to jobs in banking, accountancy and so on.
zh: 有可能从计算机领域扩展到银行、会计等行业。

en: The operation of a computer keyboard requires less effort than that of a manual typewriter.
zh: 操作电脑键盘比操作手动打字机所需的力气要小。

en: Computers save us a lot of time and trouble.
zh: 电脑为我们节省了大量的时间和精力。

en: Compared to a computer, a word processor has a single purpose.
zh: 与电脑相比，文字处理器的用途单一。

en: Put all the books about computers together.
zh: 把所有关于电脑的书放在一起。

en: What kinds of things do you have on the computer?
zh: 你的电脑里有什么东西？

en: I feed data into a computer.
zh: 我把数据输入电脑。

en: If you don't know anything about computers, you're really behind the times.
zh: 如果你对电脑一无所知，你就真的落后于时代了。

en: Computers can do the job with ease.
zh: 电脑可以轻松完成这项工作。
